text: Mister MV et La bouuule magique !

text: Looks like we'll never journey into that little forest after all. Great music. it's sad yet very full of life. Much like how the game could of been.
author: Griffith

text: It's things like this that makes this list very, very special.

text:
xavier dangs music is phenomenal

text: I think I got them from the official website back when the game was still in development. They only had 4 songs up for download though.
author: SupraDarky

text: This was very beautiful. Where were you able to find the soundtrack? Since the game was cancelled I'm pretty sure I won't find the soundtrack on youtube anywhere.
author: xcrossx

text: Hmmm... The story of this game's development kind of reminds me of Black Sigil, except that RPG is actually getting released! Yay!
author: jackal27

text: I remember hearing about this game a long time ago. I kind of forgot about it but after hearing this piece of music and seeing the name again, I suddenly remembered it! Too bad it was cancelled, this piece of music sounds really nice.
author: osirisvir

text:
A sorrowful, beautiful song for a forest no one will ever explore...

Favorited.
author: Sephiko

text: Perhaps they couldn't cover production costs. Maybe they can rework it and shove it onto WiiWare, eliminating said costs.

text: Nice song.  Too bad they cancelled the game.  Too many potentially good games get cancelled these days.

text: Canceling anything remotely reminiscent of Chrono Trigger is fail, give the game a chance, lol.
